Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is BULGARIA. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 12 BG.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Rhodope Mountains. The reference mountain landscape of this VC is Smolyan Municipality in Smolyan Province (BG424).   The size of the area (km2) is 859.6. The minimum altimetry of the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is unspecified. The maximum altimetry of the LAU is unspecified. The total population (in thousand) is 36.475. The population density (Inhabitants/km2) in the LAU is 42.43. The population change rate of the LAU in the last 10 years (%) is unspecified. The overall regional population density (Inhabitants/km2) is 63.70. The regional population change rate in the last 10 years (%) has been -0.06%.   The average per capita income (EUR/year) [Province] is 5400. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Province] is 500. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 8.40%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 38.80%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 52.80%. The per capita income (EUR/year) [Region] is 5600. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Region] is 6888. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 5.90%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 35.20%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 59.00%.   The total number of bed places (BPs) in tourist accommodations/year in the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 10138. The regional (Region) share of total BPs/year is 37.40%. The number of agricultural holdings in the LAU is 20890. The nearest settlement with population over 100000 (km) is unspecified. In this region protected areas are present.   The primary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 20.50%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 38.00%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is 41.40%. The primary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 24.20%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 30.70%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 45.10%.   Well-established music festival and counter-culture event that is organised annually in a small village in the Rhodope mountains. It has an international reputation for its unique location, beautiful mountain landscapes, good music and wholesome experience. Uk-organised, but largely hosted by village residents.   N/A. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current. This VC is classified as Innovative.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is Exogenous. The innovation is related to New products, New processes and New marketing strategies. The land use systems involved are N/A. The local assets include Natural.
